entry.summary: Finding weird bugs in my micropub server after months of no updates is fun. I've been meaning to make some changes to it so maybe now is the time.

entry.title: Reply to https://www.manton.org/2023/07/15/we-finally-installed.html
entry.summary: I'm happy to know this isn't just me. I've had a fire alarm waiting to be installed for 6 months now but that's future benji's problem.
entry.content: I'm happy to know this isn't just me. I've had a fire alarm waiting to be installed for 6 months now but that's future benji's problem.
